channel.title: Need help with armadyl battlestaff and completenist cape (reward)
channel.description:

added models and ints but i cant see the items if i wield them plz help!!??
if anyone knows how to fix, i will reward you

item.title: Need help with armadyl battlestaff and completenist cape (reward)
item.dc:creator: @damnscape damnscape
item.description:

i found it i think
i added the item ids for the arma battlestaff
to like a real staff
i used normal battlestaff
and now when i try to wear i see my staff
